definition: entirely/without exception/(literary) to be together/to be alike
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies
club (the organisation or its premises) (loanword)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to increase steadily/to grow with each passing day
every kind/every variety under the sun/a complete gamut
(idiom) take care of everything; handle everything
to shed tears while recounting sth/speaking in a tearful voice
every hope turns to dust (idiom); completely disheartened
(of a thief, smuggler etc) to be caught with stolen or illegal goods/to be caught red-handed
mud and sand flow together (idiom)/good and bad mingle
not a sound to be heard (idiom)
to burn both jade and common stone/to destroy indiscriminately (idiom)
all neglected tasks are being undertaken (idiom)/work is now underway

sentences.english: All the kings of the nations, even all of them, lie in glory, every one in his own house.
sentences.chinese: 列國的君王俱各在自己陰宅的榮耀中安睡。

sentences.english: Harmony and unity generally make designs more visually appealing and interesting.
sentences.chinese: 協調與統一通常會使設計作品更俱視覺引力和趣味性。

sentences.english: Forget all the past smoke, heart selfless heaven and earth wide.
sentences.chinese: 如煙往事俱忘卻，心底無私天地寬。

sentences.english: A hymn is also dedicated to him alone in Rig Veda.
sentences.chinese: 利俱吠陀也有一首獨一無二獻身於他的詩。

sentences.english: Alleged 'bead curtain hook don't roll, horse, every hang remote peak practice to its strong also fitting.
sentences.chinese: 所謂‘珠簾鉤不卷，匹練掛遙峯，俱不足以擬其壯也。

sentences.english: Baisha in nirvana, with Ju black.
But spotlighting automotive trade may be risky for China.
sentences.chinese: 但是中國凸顯汽車貿易對它來說也俱風險。

sentences.english: But Sima Xi had forgot all the past.
sentences.chinese: 而司馬樨對前塵往事俱已忘卻。

sentences.english: Perceiver and perceptions do not exist.
sentences.chinese: 知覺者與所知覺俱不存在。

sentences.english: So, what happened is that people thought therefore the Rg Veda cannot be talking about India.
sentences.chinese: 所以，人們認爲梨俱吠陀不可能是談論印度。

sentences.english: Pleasant wind came with soft rain from east.
sentences.chinese: 微雨從東來，好風與之俱。

sentences.english: They have desks , sofas , bookcases and cabinets on sale .
sentences.chinese: 他們有書桌，沙發，書架和廚俱廉售。

sentences.english: And we forget that at our own risk.
sentences.chinese: 我們還忘記了福禍俱出於我們自己之手。

sentences.english: Shaoxing rice wine is great in color, smell and taste.
sentences.chinese: 紹興黃酒，芬芳醇厚，色香味俱隹。

sentences.english: All the kings of the nations lie in state , each in his own tomb.
sentences.chinese: 列國的君王俱各在自己陰宅的榮耀中安睡。

sentences.english: No eulogy would do justice to so Great a man.
sentences.chinese: 任何頌辭，俱不能稱此偉人偉大於萬一。

definition: none doesn't/there is none who isn't/everyone
that being the case/then/in that case
to shake like an aspen/to shiver with fear (idiom)
